name: Shoot Bubble Jungle Line
description:
Shoot Bubble Jungle Line is a great new bubbles shooter game with 900 amazing levels, like the classic bubble shooter and arcade bubble shooter version every one loves. to make them burst, every bubbles you burst will charge your boosts that you can then blast where ever you choose to in order to clear the levels and get rid of
How To Play:
You need to match jungle bubbles of same color together to clear the game board to win the level, if you blast more than 3 bubbles of same color you can get multi color bomb or a big bomb that blow everything near it no matter what color the bubbles is
